text: I, at least, struggle to understand her career. Her performance as a junkie in “ The Town ” features the “ Bride Wars ” of Boston accents. Her performance in “ The Age of Adaline ” — as a woman “ cursed ” to stay 30 forever — was like watching a mermaid ride a bike. She tries. But her acting hasn ’ t yet caught up to her algorithm - generated beauty. Alas, there may be no algorithmic solution for that. So I was less than psyched at the prospect of seeing her shiver on a buoy, stitch her own wounds, talk to animals or play a Nancy.
